name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sudo Focus: Swap distracting sites with favorite quotes

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swap distracting sites with favorite quotes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your time and unlock your full potential. Download it today and experience the difference of focused browsing! Introducing SudoFocus, your personal gateway to focused browsing and improved productivity. Designed to combat distractions and procrastination and help you achieve your goals, this Chrome extension empowers you to:

- Ditch distractions! Block any website & add custom messages with just a click. Stay on track, stay focused. ‚è∞
- No more boring "blocked" screens! Choose your motivational Quotes and put them on the screen.
- We have a pre loaded list of major sites that you may want to block, but you can remove or add new websites as per your requirement. 
- Explore and manage pre-loaded motivational quotes displayed when accessing blocked pages for added inspiration.
- There is a list of FAQs in the settings section of the extension to help you better use the features of the extension.
- For any query contact support@sudofocus.com

Stay Focused, Get Things Done!
